import sys

read = sys.stdin.read
readline = sys.stdin.readline
readlines = sys.stdin.readlines
sys.setrecursionlimit(10 ** 9)
INF = 1 << 60
MOD = 1000000007


def main():
    X, Y = list(map(int, readline().split()))

    print((X + Y // 2))

    return

    main()
